The size chart measurements for Large are correct, and it's a slightly loose fit on me. I'm 30K/40-35-38 and 5'3". The length of the jacket is better suited for short people, I think, especially if you plan to wear this buttoned up. But if you are tall and more flat chested, it should be okay. It's not tight in the arms and shoulders. The quality and fabric is good and it's lined so I don't think the pricing is too out of line. It's the kind of fabric that doesn't seem like it will get wrinkled easily or be difficult to care for, so that's nice.

The jacket was fine but didn’t fit right.  Asked for and received a mailing label which no carrier could use as a return address.  No way to contact the seller.  Make sure you love this jacket and would never want to return before you purchase.

6 6nThis jacket is beautiful, quality way above my expectations. HOWEVER  I  am 5'5", 149 lbs. I ordered a large as suggested and it was HUGEI would say a size 16 or 18. I ordered a medium because the jacket was beautiful before I processed the return of the large. Big mistake!! The medium was too big, probably a size12 to 14. When I went to return the price started at $80 for each piece for shipping.  I reached out to Amazon. They contacted the seller and I was supposed to receive a free return label in 5 days. Waited 7 days, nothing. Reached out to Amazon again and they refunded my money on both jackets. So thankful for their great customer service but now I am scared to by any clothing on Amazon,  especially if it comes from China 🙄

This MINA SELF Tweed Cropped Blazer is very nice and fits well. The soft pink color is as advertised.  It’s on the thinner side and lightweight. It’s comfortable to wear and non-scratchy. The fabric is a decent quality…I only saw one tiny pull, or fuzzy spot on the sleeve.  The “dupe” buttons are nice and seam to be well attached.  It fits true to size and true to the size chart. I’m wearing a L…for reference my bust measurement is 41”(38D), my waist is 35” and my upper arm circumference is 13.5”.
